data.title: Democracy. An American Novel
data.meta_description: London, Macmillan and Co., 1882 first UK edition / 1880. Octavo, iv , 280, 4 , 24 publisher's catalogue dated May 1882 pages. Original green cloth lettered in gilt on the spine, all edges uncut; cloth a little flecked, marked, rubbed and bubbled; slight marginal damage to the leading edge of two leaves in the catalogue due to inexpert opening ; occasional light marks to the text where flowers have been pressed; a very good copy.
data.text:
London, Macmillan and Co., 1882 (first UK edition)/ 1880.

Octavo, [iv], 280, [4], 24 (publisher's catalogue dated May 1882) pages.

Original green cloth lettered in gilt on the spine, all edges uncut; cloth a little flecked, marked, rubbed and bubbled; slight marginal damage to the leading edge of two leaves in the catalogue (due to inexpert opening); occasional light marks to the text where flowers have been pressed; a very good copy.

Item #55936
